profile.name: Zahid DevOps
profile.title: Senior DevOps Engineer & Cloud Architect
profile.tagline: Automating the future, one pipeline at a time.
profile.about: I am a passionate DevOps Engineer with over 3 years of experience in building scalable infrastructure, automating CI/CD pipelines, and optimizing cloud costs. I specialize in Kubernetes, AWS, and Infrastructure as Code.

experience.description: Leading the platform engineering team. Migrated 50+ microservices to Kubernetes. Reduced AWS costs by 30% through spot instance optimization.
Implemented fully automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Ansible. Managed hybrid cloud infrastructure.
Managed Linux servers (CentOS/Ubuntu). Automating backup and recovery processes.

projects.title: Multi-Cloud K8s Cluster

projects.title: Serverless API Gateway
projects.description: Built a serverless API gateway using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB for a high-traffic e-commerce site.

projects.title: GitOps with ArgoCD
